name: Development
info: Dev event consists of two categories: Web Development and App Development. The prompt will be the same for both and participants can choose to submit their entries in either of the two or both.

name: Design
info: The Design consists of three categories: 3D Design, Graphic Design, and UI Design. There will be separate prompts for each category; participants can take part in one or more categories.

name: Audio/Video Editing
info: A/V editing is a diverse field that can be categorized into four broad types; Films, Motion grpahics, animations and videos. Check out the promt for more information!

name: Encryptid
info: Tech Syndicate's annual cryptic hunt, a scavenger hunt-like experience, based on web security, cryptography, and steganography.

name: Crossword
info: A tech-based crossword solely based on puns. The only things that you need to know are the name's of really popular tech companies, products, or games.

name: Group Discussion
info: An engaging panel discussion debating the rights and wrongs of the latest technology trends/issues. It consists of a group of individuals having an intellectual discussion.

name: Quiz
info: An enthralling quiz based on the field of computers, technology, and recent events in the world of IT.

name: Gaming
info: Participants will play highly competitive and engaging PC game(s) during the event.

name: Programming
info: Participants shall compete with each other and solve exciting programming challenges.

name: Photography
info: Participants will be required to click a photo using their own equipment relevant to the given theme.

name: Audio Mixing
info: Participants will have to create an audio track using the audio samples provided.

name: Film Making
info: Participants will have to create a short film (<5 minutes) on the theme provided and they will be judged on the basis of overall idea, dialogues, scenes, originality and editing.

name: Hardware
info: Participants have to solve a series of 4 tasks that are related to linux, physical computer hardware, etc.
